org.youscope.addon.component

Class ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.addon.component.ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentAddonFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoFocusJobFactory, BrentFocusSearchAddonFactory, CellDetectionJobAddonFactory, CellXAddonFactory, ChangePositionJobAddonFactory, ComposedImagingJobAddonFactory, CompositeJobAddonFactory, ContinuousImagingJobFactory, ControllerJobAddonFactory, DefaultObserverFactory, DeviceJobAddonFactory, DeviceSlidesJobAddonFactory, DropletMicrofluidicJobAddonFactory, EvaporationControllerFactory, ExhaustiveFocusSearchAddonFactory, FlexibleControllerFactory, FluigentJobAddonFactory, FocusingJobAddonFactory, GlowVisualizerAddonFactory, ImagingJobAddonFactory, LabelVisualizerAddonFactory, LiveModifiableJobAddonFactory, MatlabScoresAddonFactory, MicroplateJobAddonFactory, NemesysJobAddonFactory, OnixJobAddonFactory, OnOffDeviceJobAddonFactory, OscillatingDeviceJobAddonFactory, OutOfFocusJobAddonFactory, ParallelImagingJobAddonFactory, PlateScanningJobAddonFactory, QuickDetectAddonFactory, RepeatJobAddonFactory, ScriptingJobAddonFactory, SimpleScoresAddonFactory, SlimJobAddonFactory, StaggeringJobAddonFactory, StandardSaveSettingsFactory, StatisticsJobAddonFactory, TableControllerFactory, WaitForUserJobAddonFactory, WaitJobAddonFactory, ZSlidesJobAddonFactory

    public class ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentAddonFactory
    Adapter simplifying addon creation.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

        public ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter(java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentAddonUI<C>> configurationAddonClass,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends Component> componentClass,
                                    ComponentMetadata<C> metadata)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given addon. The class componentClass must have one of the following constructors:
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration, ConstructionContext initializer)
        In these constructors, C is identical with the class returned by metadata.getConfigurationClass(), respectively the generic constructor type.
        Parameters:
        configurationAddonClass - The UI exposed to the user.
        componentClass - The component which can be created by the addon.
        metadata - Metadata about this addon.

      • ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

        public ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter(java.lang.String typeIdentifier,
                                    java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends Component> componentClass)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given addon. The class componentClass must have one of the following constructors:
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration, ConstructionContext initializer)
        In these constructors, C is identical with configurationClass, respectively the generic constructor type.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - Type identifier of addon.
        configurationClass - Configuration class of addon. Used in automatic UI construction.
        componentClass - The component which can be created by the addon.

      • ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

        public ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter(java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentAddonUI<C>> configurationAddonClass,
                                    CustomAddonCreator<C,?> customCreator,
                                    ComponentMetadata<C> metadata)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given addon.
        Parameters:
        configurationAddonClass - The UI exposed to the user.
        customCreator - A custom creator to initialize the component given the configuration.
        metadata - Metadata about this addon.

      • ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

        public ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter(java.lang.String typeIdentifier,
                                    java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                                    CustomAddonCreator<C,?> customCreator)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given addon.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - Type identifier of addon.
        configurationClass - Configuration class of addon. Used in automatic UI construction.
        customCreator - A custom creator to initialize the component given the configuration.

      • ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter

        public ComponentAddonFactoryAdapter()
        Constructor. Does no invoke any addon. Use addAddon() to expose addons later on.

    • Method Detail

      • createComponent

        public Component createComponent(PositionInformation positionInformation,
                                 Configuration configuration,
                                 ConstructionContext constructionContext)
                          throws ConfigurationException,
                                 AddonException
        Description copied from interface: ComponentAddonFactory
        Creates an addon for the given configuration. Throws a construction addon exception if the configuration type provided is not supported.
        Specified by:
        createComponent in interface ComponentAddonFactory
        Parameters:
        positionInformation - The position in the measurement hierarchy where the addon should be constructed.
        configuration - The configuration of the addon.
        constructionContext - The context of the construction, providing information and functionality in the construction of the addon.
        Returns:
        The constructed addon.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Thrown if the configuration is invalid.
        AddonException - Thrown if an error occurred during the construction.

      • addAddon

        public <C extends Configuration> void addAddon(java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentAddonUI<C>> configurationAddonClass,
                                               CustomAddonCreator<C,?> customCreator,
                                               ComponentMetadata<C> metadata)
        Adds an addon which does component creation on its own, as well as has an own UI.
        Parameters:
        configurationAddonClass - Class providing the UI elements.
        customCreator - A custom creator to initialize the component given the configuration.
        metadata - Metadata of the component.

      • addAddon

        public <C extends Configuration> void addAddon(java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentAddonUI<C>> configurationAddonClass,
                                               java.lang.Class<? extends Component> componentClass,
                                               ComponentMetadata<C> metadata)
        Adds an addon with an own UI, but automatic component creation by appropriate constructors of the component. The class componentClass must have one of the following constructors:
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration, ConstructionContext initializer)
        In these constructors, C is identical with the class returned by metadata.getConfigurationClass(), respectively the generic constructor type.
        Parameters:
        configurationAddonClass -
        componentClass -
        metadata -

        public <C extends Configuration> void addAddon(java.lang.String typeIdentifier,
                                               java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                                               java.lang.Class<? extends Component> componentClass)
        Adds an addon with an automatically generated UI, as well as automatic component creation by appropriate constructors of the component. The class componentClass must have one of the following constructors:
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration)
        • Foo(PositionInformation positionInformation, C configuration, ConstructionContext initializer)
        In these constructors, C is identical with configurationClass, respectively the generic constructor type.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier -
        configurationClass -
        componentClass -

      • getSupportedTypeIdentifiers

        public java.lang.String[] getSupportedTypeIdentifiers()
        Description copied from interface: ComponentAddonFactory
        Returns a list of all component type identifiers supported by this factory. A type identifier is a string unique for a given component type, with which the component type is identified.
        Specified by:
        getSupportedTypeIdentifiers in interface ComponentAddonFactory
        Returns:
        List of supported component types.

      • isSupportingTypeIdentifier

        public boolean isSupportingTypeIdentifier(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentAddonFactory
        Returns true if this factory supports configurations with the given ID, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isSupportingTypeIdentifier in interface ComponentAddonFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The ID of the configuration for which it should be queried if this factory supports its construction.
        Returns:
        True if this factory supports creating configurations with the given ID, false otherwise.

      • createComponentUI

        public ComponentAddonUI<?> createComponentUI(java.lang.String typeIdentifier,
                                             YouScopeClient client,
                                             YouScopeServer server)
                                      throws AddonException
        Description copied from interface: ComponentAddonFactory
        Returns a new UI to configure a component of the given type identifier.
        Specified by:
        createComponentUI in interface ComponentAddonFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The ID for which a configuration addon should be created.
        client - Interface to allow the addon to communicate with the client.
        server - Interface to the server.
        Returns:
        The created addon for a given configuration type.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if configuration type identifier is not supported by this factory, or if any general error occured during the configuration addon creation.

      • getComponentMetadata

        public ComponentMetadata<?> getComponentMetadata(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
                                          throws AddonException
        Description copied from interface: ComponentAddonFactory
        Returns the metadata (like human readable name) for a given configuration type.
        Specified by:
        getComponentMetadata in interface ComponentAddonFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The type identifier of the configuration for which the metadata should be returned.
        Returns:
        The metadata of the given configuration.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if identifier is not supported by the addon.
